modName: Iron Armor Dark Retexture SEMI Hd Male
summary: Darkish-Red retexture for Iron Armor, male version, semi Hd. Sharpened. With high resolution settings, it will look  better than vanilla texture, even in low resolution
descriptionHtml:
This mod includes:
New texture for the Iron Armor - includes new colour and better resolution - semi Hd.


Basically, this mod replaces vanilla texture. Vanilla one gets pretty boring after some time, and many of us play dark lords, so this one may suit you better. 

WARNING: Includes only MALE chest armor, boots and gloves. HELMET retexture and female version is not included. 

How to obtain:
Craftable under \"Iron\" tab at the Forge.

Install: 
Copy and paste textures from my file to your \\Program Filles\\The Elder Scrolls V-Skyrim\\Data   file.


Permission: 
I do not permit this to be re-uploaded.


I hope you\'ll like this version of Iron Armor and enjoy wearing it.
author: iiwemm
